translations: 把……装入袋中（bag 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: My kids have been brown-bagging it this week.
sentences.translation: 我几个孩子这个星期一直是自带午餐上学。

sentences.sentence: My first job was bagging groceries.
sentences.translation: 我的第一份工作是向袋子里装食品。

sentences.sentence: This enterprising farmer seems to be one step ahead of the rest, bagging his fruits while they're still on the tree.
sentences.translation: 这位很有远见的村民看起来比别人都提早一步，他在果实还在书上的时候就给它们套上了袋。
